attributes.action: FEE REFUND LONDON SCHOOL OF BUSINESS AND FINANCE
attributes.additional_details: We want London School of Business and Finance to pay back the refund of tuition fee they owe because of visa refusals, hundreds of students are waiting from years. Nobody has ever taken an action against such fraudsters because of who international students are unable to complete their studies and blame goes on UKBA not enforcing such colleges and universities.
